title: Pixel 3 XL Jabra Elite 75t bluetooth extremely choppy
content:
The Jabra Elite 75t paired with my Pixel 3XL worked smoothly for a significant period of time and then, suddenly, a few months ago, the sound became completely erratic and very choppy.

The only situation in which the sound doesn't chop is if the earbuds and the phone are in clear line of sight, separated by less than one foot.

Earbuds work perfectly when paired with a Pixel 3a.

Pixel 3XL
Android 11 
Build RQ2A.210405.005
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
